title: Strictly legend Erin Boag looks 'ageless' as she makes It Takes Two comeback
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing legend Erin Boag returned to It Takes Two tonight - and viewers thought she looked 'ageless'.

The former Strictly professional dancer appeared in the very first episode of the show and was on our screens for 10 years.

Erin, who was previously Anton du Beke's dancing partner, came back for a special edition of choreography corner.

Presenter Rylan Clark Neal told Erin said: "We’ve not seen a return like this since Bobby Ewing stepped out of that shower. With 10 years of Strictly under her belt, look who’s back. It’s Erin Boag."

The 44-year-old, from New Zealand, admitted it was great to be back on It Takes Two as Rylan admitted she looked "absolutely sensational".

(Image: BBC)

(Image: PA)

It Takes Two viewers flocked to Twitter after watching Erin on tonight's show.

"Lovely to see @Erinboag doing choreography corner tonight. Love seeing all our former fantastic pro dancers on #ITT," said one viewer.

Another asked: "@Erinboag it was so lovely to see you on #ItTakesTwo tonight lovely lady you looked fabulous, do you ever age or has time stopped still???"

"Awwwaaahhhhhhhhhh I’ve missed you! So lovely to see you on @bbcstrictly #ItTakesTwo You always look amazing! Bottle it up & sell it baby; call it ‘Boag Visage’," said a third.

A fourth agreed: "Yay! The delightful @Erinboag is back on #ItTakesTwo bringing the class! This has made my day!"

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Erin had her say on the dances from the weekend and gave criticism and compliments to the celebrities.

While discussing Michelle Visage, Erin said: "I’m going to say this, as I am too now a middle aged lady, she is on fire. We love her."

And Erin got up on her feet for 'demo time' with Rylan - and she admitted she was impressed by his dancing ability.

(Image: BBC)

Erin was also very complimentary of former Emmerdale star Kelvin Fletcher.

She admitted: "For a man who has only been dancing for five or six weeks he is incredible. What I find best about him is his parenting skills. He brings her out and turns her back in and stops her.

"He has this bulky body. He’s very buff. He probably doesn’t have that fluidity but they’re working on it."

*It Takes Two airs weekdays on BBC Two at 6.30pm
description: The former Strictly Come Dancing professional wowed fans and Rylan Clark Neal with her 'absolutely sensational' appearance
